description: Retrieves a GuardDuty detector specified by the detectorId. There might be regional differences because some data sources might not be available in all the Amazon Web Services Regions where GuardDuty is presently supported. For more information, see Regions and endpoints.

parameters.name: DetectorId
parameters.description: The unique ID of the detector that you want to get. To find the detectorId in the current Region, see the Settings page in the GuardDuty console, or run the ListDetectors API.

nested_items.name: CreatedAt
nested_items.description: The timestamp of when the detector was created.

nested_items.name: FindingPublishingFrequency
nested_items.description: The publishing frequency of the finding.

nested_items.name: ServiceRole
nested_items.description: The GuardDuty service role.

nested_items.name: Status
nested_items.description: The detector status.

nested_items.name: UpdatedAt
nested_items.description: The last-updated timestamp for the detector.

nested_items.name: DataSources
nested_items.description: Describes which data sources are enabled for the detector.

nested_items.name: CloudTrail
nested_items.description: An object that contains information on the status of CloudTrail as a data source.

nested_items.name: Status
nested_items.description: Describes whether CloudTrail is enabled as a data source for the detector.

nested_items.name: Status
nested_items.description: Denotes whether DNS logs is enabled as a data source.

nested_items.name: Status
nested_items.description: Denotes whether VPC flow logs is enabled as a data source.

nested_items.name: Status
nested_items.description: A value that describes whether S3 data event logs are automatically enabled for new members of the organization.

nested_items.name: Kubernetes
nested_items.description: An object that contains information on the status of all Kubernetes data sources.

nested_items.name: AuditLogs
nested_items.description: Describes whether Kubernetes audit logs are enabled as a data source.

nested_items.name: Status
nested_items.description: A value that describes whether Kubernetes audit logs are enabled as a data source.

nested_items.name: MalwareProtection
nested_items.description: Describes the configuration of Malware Protection data sources.

nested_items.name: ScanEc2InstanceWithFindings
nested_items.description: Describes the configuration of Malware Protection for EC2 instances with findings.

nested_items.name: EbsVolumes
nested_items.description: Describes the configuration of scanning EBS volumes as a data source.

nested_items.name: Status
nested_items.description: Describes whether scanning EBS volumes is enabled as a data source.

nested_items.name: Reason
nested_items.description: Specifies the reason why scanning EBS volumes (Malware Protection) was not enabled as a data source.

nested_items.name: ServiceRole
nested_items.description: The GuardDuty Malware Protection service role.
(string) ---
(string) ---

nested_items.name: Features
nested_items.description: Describes the features that have been enabled for the detector.

nested_items.name: Name
nested_items.description: Indicates the name of the feature that can be enabled for the detector.

nested_items.name: Status
nested_items.description: Indicates the status of the feature that is enabled for the detector.

nested_items.name: UpdatedAt
nested_items.description: The timestamp at which the feature object was updated.

nested_items.name: AdditionalConfiguration
nested_items.description: Additional configuration for a resource.

nested_items.name: Name
nested_items.description: Name of the additional configuration.

nested_items.name: Status
nested_items.description: Status of the additional configuration.

nested_items.name: UpdatedAt
nested_items.description: The timestamp at which the additional configuration was last updated. This is in UTC format.
